_sText:
Blurb
Following a successful mission which involved your team of freedom fighters versus the counter terrorists, you managed to overwhelm the enemy and get them out of harms way. But on entering a new part of town you have recieved word that there is another team of counter terrorists heading your way from an American Embassy.


Mission Objectives
Counter Terrorists:
Head south where you will find a group of hostages. Remember there are two roots to this place so be warned of the enemy choosing one route and you being on it. Shoot to kill.

Terrorists
Stop the Counter Terrorists from extracting the hostages, you must eliminate all enemy forces. Backup will be arriving soon at your current position to extract the hostages to an undisclosed location.
